nodes.text: Corosi 7 was a terrestrial moon with a rocky surface. Around 1 ABY, Rebel Alliance heroes Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa and Han Solo escaped the Galactic Empire's attack on their base at the Mako-Ta Space Docks in a Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier, landing the ship on Corosi 7, where they received a transmission from Chancellor Mon Mothma. As the carrier was severely damaged, Solo took them to Nar Shaddaa, so that he could ask fellow smuggler Sana Starros to transport them in her ship, the Volt Cobra.
Corosi 7 appeared in the comic Star Wars 55, which was written by Kieron Gillen, illustrated by Salvador Larroca, and published on October 3, 2018.
